mode_testing_validation.overview: Guidelines for testing and validating newly created modes to ensure they function correctly and integrate well with the Roo Code ecosystem.

item.check: Mode slug is unique and follows naming conventions
All required fields are present and non-empty

item.validation: Prefer storing substantial mode guidance in XML files under .roo/rules-[slug]/. Small, high-level glue text in customInstructions is acceptable when needed.

item.check: File restrictions use valid regex patterns
item.test_method: Validate by comparing the regex pattern against the intended file sets; confirm patterns match intended files and avoid overbroad matches.

item.check: whenToUse clearly differentiates from other modes
XML files are well-formed and valid
item.validation: No syntax errors, proper closing tags
Examples align with current permissions and constraints

item.check: File paths in examples are consistent

item.test: Switch to the new mode and verify it loads
Verify representative actions for each permission category
Attempt to edit allowed and restricted files
Test with minimal input, errors, edge cases

step.title: Configuration Testing

actions.action: Verify mode appears in available modes list
Check that mode metadata displays correctly

step.verification: Confirm via user feedback. If unclear, ask a focused clarifying question with options like: "Visible and switchable", "Not visible", or "Visible but errors".

test.action: Verify read access works for representative files

test.expected: An explicit permission/restriction error for non-matching files

actions.action: Execute main workflow from start to finish

issue.solution: Check YAML syntax, validate slug format
Test regex pattern, use proper escaping
Verify file locations and XML validity

practice.name: Directory/file inventory
practice.usage: Verify instruction files exist in the correct location
practice.guidance: Check the .roo directory structure and ensure the expected rules-[slug] folder and XML files exist.

practice.name: Configuration review
practice.guidance: Review .roomodes to validate YAML structure and entries for the target mode.

practice.name: Regex validation
practice.guidance: Use targeted checks conceptually to confirm fileRegex patterns match intended files and exclude others.

best_practices.practice: Test incrementally as you build the mode
Start with minimal configuration and add complexity
Document any special requirements or dependencies
Consider edge cases and error scenarios
Get feedback from potential users of the mode
